title: How do you cope with losing a loved one?
body:
Lost my brother last night due to alcoholism. Unfortunately, the addiction had lead to him developing epilepsy and eventually, his body just began to shut down all together, especially over this last year. Wenesday night, he had a seizure that caused him to go into cardiac arrest, and he couldn't be resuscitated.

Everything feels really surreal right now, and I know that I've had my own share of drinking problems... families even compared me to him; But, since I had last visited him (about a week ago) I haven't even been able to touch alcohol, or even look at it without getting sick.

Still though, how does one cope? I never thought I would lose my oldest brother, he was only 33.
